title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1020.9 - Conduct of disbarred or suspended attorneys
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1020.9 - Conduct of disbarred or suspended attorneys

State Regulations
A respondent suspended or disbarred from the practice
of law by order of the Appellate Division, Fourth Department shall comply with
section
1240.15
of this Title, including
the filing of an affidavit in the form prescribed therein, together with proof
that a copy of the affidavit was served on counsel to the committee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1020.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
